alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Western Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:07PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Addison County through 400 PM EDT. This area has already received multiple rounds of rain... At 306 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weybridge, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall rates. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding of water in poor drainage and low lying areas will be possible. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, New Haven, Bristol, Weybridge, Cornwall, Lincoln, Monkton, Brooksville, New Haven Mills, West Lincoln and New Haven Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
